attributes.action: not ban the right to own swords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersighned propose the goverment to keep the law in place to keep the right to own and collect swords and only impose laws to have people regester them and not ban them outright because  there are genuine collecters and re-enactors out there who would be torn but the outright banning

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "not ban the right to own swords."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15971.asp

Prime Minister's Office
